Option.Name: OrganizerAddress
Option.Description: Check for Organizer email address (PR_SENT_REPRESENTING_EMAIL_ADDRESS)

Option.Name: OrganizerName
Option.Description: Check for Organizer display name (PR_SENT_REPRESENTING_NAME)

Option.Name: SenderAddress
Option.Description: Check for Sender email address (PR_SENDER_EMAIL_ADDRESS)

Option.Name: SenderName
Option.Description: Check for Sender display name (PR_SENDER_NAME)

Option.Name: NoSubject
Option.Description: Check for No Subject if in the future or if recurring

Option.Name: MessageClass
Option.Description: Check the Message Class for non-standard classes

Option.Name: ConflictItems
Option.Description: Check for Conflict items in the Calendar - can prevent mailbox moves in Exchange

Option.Name: RecurItemLimit
Option.Description: Check for recurring meetings limit - 1300 is the max allowed

Option.Name: ItemSize10
Option.Description: Check for items over 10M in size

Option.Name: ItemSize25
Option.Description: Check for items over 25M in size

Option.Name: ItemSize50
Option.Description: Check for items over 50M in size

Option.Name: AttachCount
Option.Description: Check for items with more than 25 attachments

Option.Name: RecurringProp
Option.Description: Check for dispidRecurring property - if it's missing the item won't display in the calendar

Option.Name: StartTimeX
Option.Description: Check for dispidApptStartWhole (start time property)

Option.Name: StartTimeMin
Option.Description: Check for items with Start Time set to 0 (year 1601)

Option.Name: StartTime1995
Option.Description: Check for items with Start time earlier than year 1995

Option.Name: StartTime2025
Option.Description: Check for items with Start time later than year 2025

Option.Name: StartTimeMax
Option.Description: Check for items with Start time greater than Outlook Boundary

Option.Name: EndTimeX
Option.Description: Check for dispidApptEndWhole (end time property)

Option.Name: EndTimeMin
Option.Description: Check for items with End Time set to 0 (year 1601)

Option.Name: EndTime1995
Option.Description: Check for items with End Time earlier than year 1995

Option.Name: EndTime2025
Option.Description: Check for items with End time later than year 2025

Option.Name: EndTimeMax
Option.Description: Check for items with End time greater than Outlook Boundary

Option.Name: RecurStartMin
Option.Description: Check the Recurrence property for start time set to 0 (year 1601)

Option.Name: RecurStart1995
Option.Description: Check the Recurrence property for start time earlier than year 1995

Option.Name: RecurStart2025
Option.Description: Check the Recurrence property for start time later than year 2025

Option.Name: RecurStartMax
Option.Description: Check the Recurrence property for start time greater than Outlook Boundary

Option.Name: RecurEndMin
Option.Description: Check the Recurrence property for end time set to 0 (year 1601)

Option.Name: RecurEnd1995
Option.Description: Check the Recurrence property for end time earlier than year 1995

Option.Name: RecurEnd2025
Option.Description: Check the Recurrence property for end time later than year 2025

Option.Name: RecurEndMax
Option.Description: Check the Recurrence property for end time greater than Outlook Boundary

Option.Name: ExceptionBounds
Option.Description: Check the Recurrence property for items that occur outside the series time boundaries

Option.Name: ExceptionData
Option.Description: Check the Recurrence property for length mismatches on Exception data

Option.Name: Duplicates
Option.Description: Check for duplicate items

Option.Name: AttendToOrganizer
Option.Description: Check for items where you are an attendee, and you became the Organizer

Option.Name: DupGlobalObjectIDs
Option.Description: Check for items with duplicate GlobalObjectIds

Option.Name: NoGlobalObjectIDs
Option.Description: Check for items with empty/missing GlobalObjectIds

Option.Name: RTAddressType
Option.Description: Check Email Address Types for recipients in the recipient table

Option.Name: RTAddress
Option.Description: Check Email Addresses for recipients in the recipient table

Option.Name: RTDisplayName
Option.Description: Check for valid/existing Display Names for recipients in the recipient table

Option.Name: RTDuplicates
Option.Description: Check for duplicated recipients in the recipient table

Option.Name: RTOrganizerAddress
Option.Description: Check for valid Email Address for recipient marked as Organizer in the recipient table

Option.Name: RTOrganizerIsOrganizer
Option.Description: Check that the recipient marked as Organizer in the recipient table matches the Organizer in SENT_REPRESENTING properties

Option.Name: HolidayItems
Option.Description: Check and report on Holiday items

Option.Name: BirthdayItems
Option.Description: Check and report on All Day items with Birthday in the subject (covers additional languages)

Option.Name: PastItems
Option.Description: Check and report problems for items that ended in the past

Option.Name: WarningIsError
Option.Description: Treat Warnings like Errors

Rule.Name: sCalcheckErrors
Rule.Title: {0} issues of type 'Error' were found in your meetings and appointments
Rule.Text:
The CalCheck tool scanned the meetings and appointments in your calendar and found {0} problems classified as an 'Error'.
Click the orange 'Calendar Issues' tile at the top of this page to see how to fix these errors. Note: the number of errors on the tile might be lower than the number reported here when two or more errors have been found for the same item

Rule.Name: sCalcheckWarnings
Rule.Title: {0} issues of type 'Warning' were found in your meetings and appointments
Rule.Text:
The CalCheck tool scanned the meetings and appointments in your calendar and found {0} problems classified as a 'Warning'.
Click the orange 'Calendar Issues' tile at the top of this page to see how to fix these warnings. Note: the number of warnings on the tile might be lower than reported here when two or more warnings have been found for the same item.
